translation.en: This is Andrea reporting for What's At Heart!
The webcast that keeps you "Up-to-Date On All That's Great" in Heartlake High.
translation.ko: 하트레이크 고교 최근 소식을 전하는 인터넷 생방송이죠

translation.en: I'm here with my crew... Emma on sound,
Mia on lights, my producer Stephanie, and cameraperson Olivia!
translation.ko: 조명 담당 미아 연출자 스테파니 카메라 담당 올리비아입니다

translation.en: Today, the Science Room, where science nerd Jacob--
translation.ko: 오늘은 과학실에 왔는데요 - 괴짜 제이콥이... - 안드레아!

translation.en: -Hey! -Sorry.
translation.ko: - 괴짜 제이콥이... - 안드레아! 죄송해요, 과학도 제이콥이 실험을 준비했다고 합니다

translation.en: Science student, Jacob, is preparing an experiment just for us.
translation.ko: 죄송해요, 과학도 제이콥이 실험을 준비했다고 합니다

translation.en: Will it work? Will it change the face of science?
Or will it fail miserably, driving Jacob into a life of regret?
translation.ko: 아니면 처참하게 실패해 평생 후회하게 될까요?

translation.en: The entire city holds its breath!
The thing you have to know about Andrea
translation.ko: 안드레아에 대해서 꼭 알아둘 게 있는데요

translation.en: is that she likes everything to be, well...dramatic.
Not a little dramatic, but eye-popping, intense, over-the-top dramatic.
translation.ko: 보통 극적인 게 아니라 눈이 튀어나오고 털이 설 만큼 부풀려요

translation.en: Especially when she's in front of the camera, which is every chance she gets.
translation.ko: 특히 카메라 앞에 서기만 하면 그런 면이 더 심해진답니다

translation.en: And that's fine, most of the time.
Oh, hi, Andrea. How nice to see you here.
What are we going to see, Jacob?
Will it be a new form of energy? A captured alien?
translation.ko: 새로운 형태의 에너지? 포획 당한 외계인?

translation.en: Or have you created life?
It's two mints and some diet cola. Should make a nice fizz.
translation.ko: 민트 두 개와 다이어트 콜라로 - 작은 거품을 만들어요 - 겨우 작은 거품이요?

translation.en: That's it? A "nice fizz"?
translation.ko: - 작은 거품을 만들어요 - 겨우 작은 거품이요?

translation.en: Pretty much.
Well, if two mints make a "nice fizz", what would a whole roll of them do?
translation.ko: 민트 두 개로 거품 난다니 전부 넣으면 어찌 될까요?

translation.en: Andrea! No!
Oopsie.
This is Andrea. Signing off for What's At Heart.
Er... Ha... And cut!
Cinnamon Sea Slugs?
-No, thanks. -I’ll pass.
-Just had some for lunch. -Maybe later.
We shot this because Andrea thought we could add it to our webcast,
translation.ko: 안드레아가 이 영상 찍어서 인터넷에 올리자고 했어요

translation.en: Our Valiant Struggle To Keep You Informed.
It was originally called Andrea's Valiant Struggle, but we voted her down.
translation.ko: 사실 원래 제목은 이거였어요 '고군분투하는 안드레아' 하지만 우리가 말렸죠

translation.en: So you need a new camera.
Didn't you lose a boom mike just last month doing your zoo special?
Principal Earhart, that wasn't totally my fault. Who knew warthogs eat metal?
translation.ko: 에어하트 교장 선생님 그건 제 잘못이 아니었어요 멧돼지가 쇠를 삼켰다고요

translation.en: Fine. All right, you'll have your camera.
But this will have to be the last time.
Our new Mayor has decided to cut back the school budget.
translation.ko: 새 시장님이 학교 예산을 줄이기로 하셨거든

translation.en: Probably since his daughter didn't get elected Student Body President.
translation.ko: 자기 딸이 회장 선거에서 떨어져서 그렇겠죠

translation.en: Peu importe.
However, we may soon be forced to cut off funding for the webcast altogether,
translation.ko: 조만간 인터넷 방송 기금도 줄여야 할지 모른단다

translation.en: maybe even the paper itself.
-What? No! No way! -You can’t!
-What about freedom of the press? -What about the public's right to know?
What about getting my face on camera every week?
translation.ko: 매주 방송 타던 제 모습은 어쩌고요?

translation.en: We were in major shock. But we all know there's only one way to deal with trouble.
translation.ko: 우리는 몹시 충격받았죠 하지만 이 문제를 해결할 방법이 딱 하나 있었어요

translation.en: Cupcake?
So is that it for our webcast?
Well, let's face it, our ratings have been falling lately.
translation.ko: 인정할 건 해야지 최근 시청률도 떨어졌고

translation.en: -There's too much competition on the web. -Tell me about it.
translation.ko: 인터넷 방송 간의 경쟁이 치열해 그러게 말야

translation.en: Seems like every student at Heartlake High has their own gossip blog.
translation.ko: 우리 학교 애들 전부 가십 블로그 하는 것 같아

translation.en: Last week, we got fewer hits than What's On The Bottom Of Matthew's Shoe?
translation.ko: 지난주에 나간 우리 방송 시청률은 '매튜 신발 밑엔 뭐가 있을까'보다 낮았어

translation.en: It was a very special episode.
We need to somehow get viewers watching again. But how?
translation.ko: 사람들을 끌어들일 방법을 찾아야 해 하지만 어떻게?

translation.en: Oh, I know! How about some cute kitten videos?
Right, the one thing the Internet needs more of is cute kittens.
translation.ko: 새끼 고양이 영상 같은 건 이미 인터넷에 쫙 깔렸다고

translation.en: No, we need something special, something spectacular,
translation.ko: 뭔가 특별하면서도 눈길을 끌 만한 게 필요해

translation.en: something that no teen would dare miss.
translation.ko: 십 대라면 놓칠 수 없는 거 말야

translation.en: I've got it! A full-hour special, Birth Of A Star!
translation.ko: 한 시간짜리 특별 방송 '스타의 탄생' 어때?

translation.en: Not another documentary about yourself, Andrea.
translation.ko: 네가 나오는 다큐멘터리는 인제 그만 하자

translation.en: But there's so much more to tell!
Actually, I kind of like the idea of a documentary.
translation.ko: 다큐멘터리를 찍자는 생각은 좋은 것 같아

translation.en: But isn't there anyone else you think is interesting?
-Livi! -Perfect!
-Awesome! -Yes!
That’s brilliant!
A documentary on the world's biggest pop star.
-It would draw viewers like flies! -You really think she'd do it?
translation.ko: 시청률이 치솟을 거라고 근데 리비가 한다고 할까?

translation.en: Are you kidding? She'd do anything for me.
translation.ko: 지금 농담해? 내 말이라면 다 들을걸

translation.en: Forget it! Not a chance! Not in this lifetime! Absolutely not!
translation.ko: 됐어! 절대 안 해! 꿈도 꾸지 마! 안 돼!

translation.en: So you're saying you'll think about it?
No! I can't stand documentaries about pop stars.
translation.ko: 아니, 내가 팝스타 나오는 다큐를 얼마나 싫어하는데

translation.en: They're always so very, awfully fake.
translation.ko: 그거 전부 다 꾸며낸 조작 방송이라니까

translation.en: Oh, you're so right! But ours will be different!
translation.ko: 네 말이 맞아 하지만 우린 다르다고

translation.en: We'll show the unvarnished truth, the real Livi, warts and all!
translation.ko: 있는 그대로를 다룰 거야 네 단점까지도 말야

translation.en: -I don't have warts. -We can fake that-- Kidding!
Livi, we swear we'll keep it honest!
And you'd be helping us save our webcast.
translation.ko: 네가 나오면 우리 방송도 살릴 수 있어

translation.en: This could be bigger than our warthog special!
Think of it this way. Please, please, please.
translation.ko: 내 말 잘 들어봐 제발, 부탁이야!

translation.en: Oh, all right, I give up! I'll do it!
But only if you promise to keep it real. Nothing phony.
translation.ko: 대신 거짓된 방송은 절대 안 하겠다고 약속해

translation.en: -Yay! Thank You, Livi! -Thanks so much!
I knew she'd say yes! I have a way with other super-talents.
translation.ko: 허락할 줄 알았어요, 제가 설득도 기막히게 잘하거든요

translation.en: This will be the biggest web sensation since Grouchy Cat!
translation.ko: 이번 건 '그럼피 캣'보다 더 큰 화제를 모을 거예요

translation.en: But you've got to stay out of the way!
translation.ko: 하지만 일할 때 방해하면 안 돼

translation.en: I’m gonna be super-busy all week rehearsing for my new video.
translation.ko: 새 뮤직비디오 때문에 이번 주 내내 바쁘단 말야

translation.en: It's the biggest, most important one of my career, so I really need to concentrate.
translation.ko: 내 가수 생활에 있어 아주 중요한 시기거든 그래서 일에 집중해야 해

translation.en: You won't even notice we're there.
translation.ko: 약속해 있는 듯 없는 듯 할게

translation.en: Livi, you're on in 60 seconds!
♪ Girls, come on, turn it up And sing along ♪
♪ Oh, we can march to the beat ♪
♪ Oh, girls We can now see it now ♪
♪ Don't doubt yourself Oh, girl ♪
♪ So let's get up, up, up ♪
♪ Girls, oh ♪
♪ You know that you can do more ♪
♪ When you feel like dancing with us ♪
♪ You know you are, you know you are Hey, hey, hey ♪
translation.ko: 할 수 있잖아 너희는 할 수 있어

translation.en: -And that's when the real trouble started. -Big-time.
translation.ko: 문제는 바로 그때부터 시작됐죠 아주 큰 문제요

translation.en: Yes, folks, glamour starts early
in Livi's super-fantastic, fabulous, at-home-pop-star life.
translation.ko: 최고 스타 리비의 꾸밈없는 평소 모습을 보러 왔습니다

translation.en: Whoops. My bad.
And mine.
Here it comes, fans! The magic moment when Livi wakes up!
translation.ko: 여러분! 리비가 깼습니다 이제 마법이 시작됩니다!

translation.en: -Huh? -Livi, Livi, it's us!
The documentary, remember?
Oh, right. Gotta go.
And cut.
Livi is now brushing her very own teeth, every one of them.
translation.ko: 지금 리비는 하나하나 꼼꼼히 이를 닦고 있는데요

translation.en: -Can you describe how you're feeling? -[mouth full, mumbling]
Yes, you heard it from her very own foam-covered lips!
translation.ko: 네, 거품을 가득 문 리비 목소리였습니다

translation.en: She spit! Did we get that?
We're watching the fabulous Livi eating the secret breakfast of superstars!
translation.ko: 여러분은 아침 식사 중인 슈퍼스타를 보고 계십니다

translation.en: Share with your fans what that is.
Stale potato chips?
So there you have it. The magic just keeps on coming!
What other glamorous moments are in store?
That's right, folks.
That's Livi's own famous cover-girl hair she's pulling out of that drain!
translation.ko: 리비가 지금 세면대에서 머리카락을 빼내고 있네요

translation.en: We were getting desperate. Livi's super-glam home life
translation.ko: 우린 점점 절박해졌죠 '리비의 멋진 사생활'은 너무 지루했으니까요

translation.en: was more boring than What's On The Bottom Of Matthew's Shoe?
translation.ko: '리비의 멋진 사생활'은 너무 지루했으니까요 '매튜 신발 밑엔 뭐가 있을까'보다도요

translation.en: Remember Matthew’s Christmas Special?
Now that's entertainment.
We finally got a tiny break when Livi's choreographer came by the house
translation.ko: 그러다 숨통이 조금 트였죠 리비의 안무가가 집에 와서

translation.en: to go over her dance routine for the music video.
Now we jazz-walk over to the big prop staircase,
translation.ko: 이제 이런 식으로 계단을 향해 걷는 거야

translation.en: then work our way up the stairs, like this.
-And jazz hands! -Tada!
-Oh, my gosh! -Can you move?
Sorry, I didn't mean to.
Come on, Brent, I'm taking you to the doctor.
And I'll speak to you later.
Okay, Olivia. Cut.
At least we have a dramatic scene to the documentary.
translation.ko: 그래도 극적인 장면을 영상에 담긴 했잖아

translation.en: Actually, Andrea, I missed it.
What? You missed it?
I suppose it would be a lot to ask him to do that again?
translation.ko: 한 번만 더 넘어져 달라고 하는 건 좀 심하지?

translation.en: -I hope he's okay! -I can't believe it.
We missed the one and only exciting thing that's happened since we got here.
translation.ko: 여기 온 이후로 가장 흥미롭고도 유일하게 재밌는 걸 놓치다니!

translation.en: If you don't count when Cookie upchucked the chips.
translation.ko: 쿠키가 감자 칩을 토하는 장면 빼고 말야

translation.en: There's got to be a way.
Or maybe we didn't miss it!
Afraid we did. The camera was pointing everywhere but at him.
translation.ko: 분명히 놓쳤어 그 순간 카메라는 주변만 맴돌았다니까

translation.en: That was then. But what if we re-stage it?
translation.ko: 그건 그때 일이고 사건을 재연하는 거지

translation.en: You mean fake it? You think that's honest?
Of course it is! I mean, it really did happen, right?
translation.ko: 그게 왜 조작이야? 실제로 일어난 일이잖아

translation.en: So it's not like we’re making stuff up.
I did see a dress dummy in the closet.
translation.ko: 나 옷장에 마네킹 있는 거 봤어

translation.en: He'll need a head, there's a melon in the fridge.
translation.ko: 머리도 있어야 하는데... 냉장고에 멜론 있어

translation.en: I'll go see what clothes are in her closet!
But... But...
There! Did he have a dimple?
Emma, we won't see him that close. It'll be really fast.
translation.ko: 자세히 안 그려도 돼 빨리 지나갈 테니까

translation.en: We'll edit it together with the real guy later.
Everyone ready? Olivia, be sure to jiggle the camera for realism.
translation.ko: 준비됐어? 올리비아, 카메라 흔들어서 진짜처럼 연출해

translation.en: And action!
And cut! It's good!
This'll be perfect for the webcast!
So that's how our real-life documentary started to get a little less real.
translation.ko: 그때부터 진실만을 찍자던 다짐이 퇴색하기 시작했죠

translation.en: It might've been okay if Andrea had left it there.
But Andrea doesn't know how to do things halfway.
translation.ko: 하지만 안드레아는 일을 대충하는 성격이 아니었죠

translation.en: Our guest is the one and only Natasha, hairdresser to the stars!
translation.ko: 오늘은 스타들의 헤어 담당 나타샤를 만났습니다

translation.en: Her very next appointment... Livi!
Is Livi always this late, Natasha?
No, darling!
Superstars are never late, it's the rest of us who are early!
translation.ko: 스타들은 절대 안 늦어 우리가 일찍 온 거지

translation.en: Her last 2:00 started at 6:00.
Today, our viewers will get to watch you work
translation.ko: 오늘 여러분은 리비의 새 뮤직비디오를 위한

translation.en: your styling magic for Livi's new music video!
It will be the thrill of your life, darling.
translation.ko: 오, 그럼 정말 굉장할 거야, 자기

translation.en: But first, I must go and prepare my secret formulas.
translation.ko: 근데 일단은 비밀 재료를 준비하러 가봐야겠어

translation.en: And cut!
Okay, let's set up here at Livi's private chair so...
translation.ko: 카메라는 여기서 리비 전용 의자 찍고...

translation.en: Natasha! It's your phone!
Hey, it's Livi calling.
Hi, Livi, it's me, Olivia! Really? You can't?
translation.ko: 응, 리비 나 올리비아야 그래? 못 온다고?

translation.en: Sure, I'll tell her.
She has to cancel the appointment.
Well, that's that. Might as well pack it up.
translation.ko: 어쩔 수 없지, 뭐 우리도 가서 짐 싸자

translation.en: Wait! We can still do this!
But Natasha will see I'm not Livi!
translation.ko: 내가 리비가 아닌 걸 나타샤가 알아챌 거야

translation.en: -Not with this, she won't. -Andrea.
translation.ko: 이렇게 하면 못 알아볼 걸 안드레아!

translation.en: It's not like we're faking it, exactly, Livi did have an appointment.
translation.ko: 사실 이건 조작이 아니라고 리비가 약속한 건 맞잖아 누가 알겠어?

translation.en: Who's gonna know?
translation.ko: 리비가 약속한 건 맞잖아 누가 알겠어?

translation.en: Livi! Darling! You look fabulous!
What is your secret?
Oh, that's right, it's me!
Now, let's make magic!
And so it went. By the time we got to Livi's music video,
translation.ko: 그 후, 리비가 뮤직비디오 찍을 때가 되자

translation.en: Andrea's definition of keeping it real had stretched to the breaking point.
translation.ko: 안드레아의 처음 다짐은 결국 한계선을 넘고 말았죠

translation.en: One-two, one-two.
Here we are, up close and personal with Livi's private make-up expert!
translation.ko: 리비의 메이크업 담당자를 밀착 취재하러 나왔습니다

translation.en: So, what's it like to work on such a famous face as Livi's?
translation.ko: 리비처럼 유명한 스타와 함께 일하는 건 어떠세요?

translation.en: You can tell us, what's her favourite shade of lip gloss?
translation.ko: 리비가 가장 좋아하는 립글로스는 무슨 색이죠?

translation.en: Aren't you her make-up artist?
Cut!
We can fix it in editing. Leave out the bucket. Nobody has to know.
translation.ko: 걱정 마 편집할 때 손보면 돼 걸레랑 양동이만 없애면 아무도 몰라

translation.en: This is ridiculous! This Livi documentary has nothing to do with Livi.
translation.ko: 안드레아 난 더는 못 하겠어 이 다큐멘터리는 리비와 아무 상관이 없잖아

translation.en: Whatever happened to the unvarnished truth?
I varnished it a little. Come on, they do it all the time on TV!
translation.ko: 조금 손댄 거 두고... TV에선 늘 하는 짓이라고

translation.en: No, I think Olivia's right. We promised Livi that we'd keep it real.
translation.ko: 아니 올리비아 말이 맞아 리비와 진실한 방송 하기로 약속했잖아

translation.en: But Andrea's got a point. We also need to keep it exciting and fun!
translation.ko: 난 안드레아 말에 동의해 방송은 흥미롭고 재미있어야 한다고

translation.en: -And completely phony?! -I suppose you could do better!
translation.ko: - 다 새빨간 거짓인데도? - 넌 잘할 수 있어?

translation.en: Anybody could. You need to stick to the facts!
translation.ko: 다 너보단 잘할 걸 사실에 입각해 방송해야지

translation.en: Then be my guest! We'll make our documentary and you make yours!
translation.ko: 그럼 맘대로 해봐! 우린 우리끼리 할 테니 넌 너대로 해보라고

translation.en: -Fine! -Fine!
-Well, Emma? -Are you with us or them?
translation.ko: - 엠마, 너는? - 누구랑 할 건지 정해

translation.en: -I... -I think she's going to explode.
translation.ko: 난... 그러니까 난... 곧 울 것 같은데?

translation.en: -I'll get sound for both teams! -Whatever.
Great. Now what are we gonna do for a video camera?
I'll use my cell phone. It'll look even more documentary-ish.
translation.ko: 휴대폰으로 찍으면 돼 더 생동감 있어 보일걸

translation.en: -Okay, everyone, showtime! Quiet on set! -They're starting! Come on!
translation.ko: 좋아요, 시작합니다 다들 조용! 시작한대 빨리 와!

translation.en: Cue playback! And action!
-I can't get a clear shot. -Get closer. Look at Olivia and Mia.
translation.ko: 화면이 너무 흐릿해 더 가까이에서 찍자 올리비아랑 미아를 봐

translation.en: -Incoming wardrobe rack! -What?!
Sorry!
Where'd that come from?
What's going on out there? Cut!
-What? What happened? -It's not my fault!
translation.ko: - 왜 그래? - 내가 그런 거 아니에요

translation.en: Cut! Someone unplug the fan!
translation.ko: 컷! 누가 선풍기 코드 좀 뽑아!

translation.en: Cut! Cut! Cut! Will someone call security! Get those girls off the set!
translation.ko: 컷! 컷! 컷! 경비 좀 불러줘! 쟤들을 내쫓으라고!

translation.en: Take cover!
Cut?
We told Livi she wouldn't even notice us.
translation.ko: 리비한테 있는 듯 없는 듯 하겠다고 했는데

translation.en: She noticed.
So that was the end of our documentary shoot,
-along with our webcast. -And our friendship with Livi.
Not only were we banned from her music video set, what was left of it,
translation.ko: 우린 뮤직비디오 세트장에 출입 금지당했죠 멀쩡한 세트도 없었지만요

translation.en: but she forbid us from coming within 50 feet of her.
translation.ko: 리비는 우릴 상대로 접근금지 신청까지 했어요

translation.en: Or any place she's ever been.
-Or might ever go. -Ever.
Well, there's nothing that sprinkles can't fix.
The worst part is, we let ourselves down. We said we were gonna keep it real.
translation.ko: 최악인 건 우리 자신을 실망시켰다는 거야 진실한 방송을 하겠다고 했잖아

translation.en: It's all my fault.
My brilliant documentary turned out to be as fake as Livi said it would.
translation.ko: 다 나 때문이야 멋진 다큐멘터리가 리비 말처럼 뻔한 조작 영상이 돼버렸어

translation.en: I'm the one who split us up, when we know we always work better as a team.
translation.ko: 팀을 갈라놓은 건 나였어 우린 함께였을 때 늘 더 잘했었잖아

translation.en: All we've got left now is egg on our faces,
translation.ko: 이제 우리한테 남은 건 쏟아질 비난과

translation.en: sprinkles in our teeth, and pieces of useless video.
-Mostly of things we blew up. -Kind of like a collage.
translation.ko: 영상 대부분은 우리가 망친 것들이지 콜라주처럼 말야

translation.en: Yes! Exactly like a collage! I've got an idea!
translation.ko: 그래, 바로 콜라주야! 좋은 생각이 있어!

translation.en: No, no, no! Listen. I swear this one will work.
translation.ko: 아냐, 내 말 들어봐 이번엔 분명 잘 될 거야!

translation.en: [Livi] Oh, no.
Please! It'll just take a minute!
Fine. One minute.
We put this music video together, since we kind of blew up yours.
translation.ko: 짜깁기해서 뮤비를 만들었어 우리가 네 걸 망쳐놨잖아

translation.en: -I love it. -[dog barks]
Speaking on behalf of my friends and myself, I'd just like to say, yay!
translation.ko: 우리 팀을 대신해서 한마디 할게 바로 이렇게 말야 '야호!'

translation.en: You should be proud.
Despite the... mass destruction that went into making it,
translation.ko: 지난번에 너희가 세트장을 엉망으로 만들긴 했지만

translation.en: this is the most inventive video I've seen in years.
translation.ko: 이렇게 독특한 뮤직비디오는 생전 처음 봐

translation.en: And much more exciting than the one I was making.
translation.ko: 내가 만드는 것보다 더 흥미로운 작품이라고

translation.en: -So you don't hate us anymore? -And we can come within 50 feet of you?
translation.ko: 그럼 이제 우리 안 미워할 거야? 접근금지 신청도 취소할 거고?

translation.en: I'll do better than that. I'm giving you permission
translation.ko: 거기에 한 가지 더하자면 '하트에선 무슨 일이'에서 이 비디오를

translation.en: to premiere this video on your What's At Heart webcast!
translation.ko: '하트에선 무슨 일이'에서 이 비디오를 처음 공개하는 건 어때?

translation.en: -Stellar! -Oh, wow!
The premiere of Livi's newest video! We'll get millions of hits!
translation.ko: 리비의 최신 뮤직비디오라니 청취자가 구름같이 몰리겠다

translation.en: This'll be even bigger than Matthew's Shoe!
So who's hungry? I have a melon in the fridge.
translation.ko: 배고픈 사람 없어? 냉장고에 멜론 있는데

translation.en: Not anymore.
It worked! What's At Heart was saved!
We even had enough good footage left over to put together the documentary.
translation.ko: 게다가 다큐멘터리에 쓸 만한 멋진 영상도 충분히 확보했고요

translation.en: -We call it Keeping It Real. -Or How Not To Make A Documentary.
